titles.title: A resolution supporting the establishment of a President's Youth Council.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 12/4/2012--Introduced. Supports the establishment with private funds of a President's Youth Council to: (1) advise the President and the executive branch on the perspectives of young people, (2) suggest ways to make investments by the federal government in youth services more effective and efficient, and (3) provide recommendations on issues that will affect the long-term future of the United States.
